About myself and my progress..

Who am I?

My Name is David Zhou, born and raised in San Francisco so I can be considered a SF Native and am able to commute within the City. Currently a student at San Franciso State University pursuing a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Engineering. My main focus is on software development, with an interest in full stack web development and currently exploring the MEAN stack while I hone my skills on web development.
